description:
On Christmas Eve, a small turkey manages to get inside a barrel, hiding from the Silva family that intended to roast it. Now disguised, it begins a saga of running, hiding, and running a little further in search of freedom.

Features:
- Be stealthy! You are escaping, after all.
- Pass through hidden tunnels in the house so enemies don't see you.
- Collect items to make new skins available.
- Take on 30 levels and the challenge of not becoming a roast turkey.
name: There Will Be No Turkey This Christmas
